resp = client.search(
    index="sales",
    aggs={
        "price_ranges": {
            "range": {
                "field": "price",
                "ranges": [
                    {
                        "to": 100
                    },
                    {
                        "from": 100,
                        "to": 200
                    },
                    {
                        "from": 200
                    }
                ]
            },
            "aggs": {
                "price_stats": {
                    "stats": {
                        "field": "price"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
